thread.title: Boris Johnson went jogging in an absolutely incredible outfit
thread.title_full: Boris Johnson went jogging in an absolutely incredible outfit

author: Mikey Smith
title: Boris Johnson went jogging in an absolutely incredible outfit
text:
Boris Johnson went jogging in an absolutely incredible outfit The fashion-forward Foreign Secretary rocked a remarkable ensemble on his daily jog around the park this morning Share Get politics updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Boris Johnson went out for a jog this morning and stunned the world with his outfit. 
The fashion forward Foreign Secretary rocked a blue 2012 Olympics branded polo shirt, paired with a beige wooly fleece, because, let's face it, it's cold. 
He kept himself entertained with a pair of UrbanEars over-the-head headphones. 
But perhaps not wanting to draw attention to his ostentatious earphones, he covered them up with a black and red striped hat. (Photo: steve back) 
And then there were the shorts. 
Oh, the shorts. 
To describe them as inappropriate for an early morning run in February is a bit like describing a pushbike as an inappropriate mode of transport for a transatlantic voyage. (Photo: steve back) 
He showed off his ample thighs, only partly obscured by a pair of red Hawaiian shorts, emblazoned with a white floral pattern. Read More 
The outfit was rounded off by a disappointingly sensible pair of Asics running shoes, and not, as one might expect from the rest of his outfit, a pair of lime green wooden clogs. (Photo: steve back) 
Johnson was photographed returning from his run to his taxpayer-funded 'grace and favour' flat near Buckingham Palace after a quick run around St James' Park. Like us on Facebook
